screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .sntm file in SolarWinds Network Topology Mapper 2
screenshot.caption: SNTM file open in SolarWinds Network Topology Mapper 2

description: SolarWinds replaced LANsurveyor with Network Topology Mapper to create and manage network maps necessary for organizations to be PCI compliance requirements. IT professionals can create complete network maps based on scans performed with Network Topology Mapper, then save them as SNTM files or export them to another format.
To create an SNTM file with Network Topology Mapper, select File â†’ Save or Save As... . After saving an SNTM file, you can close the map, then re-open it to modify it further.
